item.title: “It’s Your Final Semester — Now What?” to be Topic of ISSS Workshop
item.description: Date: Monday, February 10, 2025 10:00 AM - 11:00 AM - Join Rensselaer’s Office of International Services for Students and Scholars (ISSS) for a virtual workshop to learn about the F-1 immigration options for life after graduation. Topics will include employment, continuing one’s studies, departing the U.S., and more.

item.title: MANE to Hold Graduate Programs Information Sessions
item.description: During the month of February, attend an information session to learn about exciting research opportunities, program requirements, funding options and application processes to MANE’s Co-terminal, traditional and part-time Master’s programs, and the Accelerated BS-PhD program. item.description: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 6:00 PM - 8:30 PM - Join SWE for the biggest Networking event of the semester, with free dinner! We will be having Haleon, TOKYO ELECTRON LIMITED, the Naval Nuclear Laboratory (FMP), CDM Smith, SABIC, and our first-time attendees: The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory, Key Tech Inc., and Strategic Mission Critical. item.title: Being & Becoming: Quartet led by trumpeter Peter Evans - February 11
item.description: Tuesday, February 11, 2025 7:00 PM - All are invited! Being & Becoming, the quartet led by trumpeter Peter Evans, gives a standing-room-only concert featuring some of the most forward-thinking young musicians in Jazz and Contemporary music. Experience Being & Becoming live in the immersive EMPAC Studio 2 venue, with charged lighting design by Azumi O E heightening the alchemic creation and recreation of musical worlds onstage. Limited capacity. $5 in advance for RPI community.

item.title: New Regulations for Methylene Chloride Use
item.description: The U. S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) has issued a new rule for methylene chloride (dichloromethane or DCM), a chlorinated solvent commonly used in laboratories and shops. EHS will host information sessions in February to review the rule and assist affected groups with compliance.

item.title: Celebrate the Achievements of Rensselaer Students
item.description: Nominate a deserving graduating student to recognize their exceptional contributions to the Rensselaer community through academic, athletic, and service endeavors. Their dedication has strengthened our community, and these awards provide a meaningful way to express our gratitude for their lasting impact. We welcome both self-nominations and referral applications. The nomination deadline is Friday, March 21, 2025, at 11:59 p.m., EDT.

item.title: As of 02/12/2025, RPI managed computers will lock after 15 minutes of inactivity
item.description:
Starting 02/12/2025, RPI managed computers will lock after an activity time out of 15 minutes. Devices unused for 15 minutes will be locked requiring your login password to unlock. This measure complies with data privacy regulations to prevent unauthorized access to sensitive information if an individual leaves their computer unattended, ensuring that only the authorized individual can access the system by requiring a password to log back in after the inactivity period.
